title: Watch Venom and Megan Thee Stallion get goofy on FaceTime
description: Megan Thee Stallion and Venom have a silly FaceTime call in a promotional clip for "Venom: The Last Dance," out Oct. 25.
excerpt: Does this officially make Venom a Hottie?
text: Does this officially make Venom a Hottie? All products featured here are independently selected by our editors and writers. If you buy something through links on our site, Mashable may earn an affiliate commission. In what might be the most surprising crossover of the year, turns out rap superstar Megan Thee Stallion and alien symbiote Venom (Tom Hardy) are besties. A promotional clip for the upcoming Venom: The Last Dance sees Venom video calling Megan and dishing out some slobbery roars. But Megan is unfazed, clapping back with some of her signature "ah"s. Soon the pair are reconciled, with Venom telling Megan, "You are the only one who understands me!"This clip isn't Megan Thee Stallion's first foray into the world of superheroes. In 2022, she made a cameo in Marvel's She-Hulk: Attorney at Law, twerking alongside Jen Walters (Tatiana Maslany) herself.Venom: The Last Dance hits theaters Oct. 25. Belen Edwards is an Entertainment Reporter at Mashable. She covers movies and TV with a focus on fantasy and science fiction, adaptations, animation, and more nerdy goodness. html:
Does this officially make Venom a Hottie?

All products featured here are independently selected by our editors and writers. If you buy something through links on our site, Mashable may earn an affiliate commission.

In what might be the most surprising crossover of the year, turns out rap superstar Megan Thee Stallion and alien symbiote Venom (Tom Hardy) are besties.

A promotional clip for the upcoming Venom: The Last Dance sees Venom video calling Megan and dishing out some slobbery roars. But Megan is unfazed, clapping back with some of her signature "ah"s. Soon the pair are reconciled, with Venom telling Megan, "You are the only one who understands me!"

This clip isn't Megan Thee Stallion's first foray into the world of superheroes. In 2022, she made a cameo in Marvel's She-Hulk: Attorney at Law, twerking alongside Jen Walters (Tatiana Maslany) herself.

Venom: The Last Dance hits theaters Oct. 25.

Belen Edwards is an Entertainment Reporter at Mashable. She covers movies and TV with a focus on fantasy and science fiction, adaptations, animation, and more nerdy goodness.

This newsletter may contain advertising, deals, or affiliate links. Subscribing to a newsletter indicates your consent to our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. You may unsubscribe from the newsletters at any time.
